content: Printing a Report from My ReportsClick "My Apricot" on the main log in page.On the left hand menu, click "My Apricot Tools."Click "My Reports"Expand the black arrow next to the report category you would like to see, then hover your mouse over the Actions arrow to the right of the report you want to print.Choose "Print."Note: This will print the report with the default filter settings found in Edit mode of the report. If you need to customize any filters please Edit or Run the report and adjust the filters as needed before clicking print.
title: Printing A Report
